critical_segfault_fix.root_cause: merge_taks_info() unconditionally called update_cpu_starving_vector() at line 389, but cpu_starving_vector only allocated in single_threaded_main() at line 1007
critical_segfault_fix.impact: Adaptive/aggressive modes crashed when parsing tasks (any backend)
critical_segfault_fix.fix: Added if (config_single_threaded) guards before both update_cpu_starving_vector() calls at lines 389 and 401
critical_segfault_fix.result: test_starvation_threshold.sh now passes on sched_debug with adaptive mode

queue_track_limitation_documentation.description: Document queue_track backend limitation in test_starvation_threshold.sh
queue_track_limitation_documentation.finding: queue_track (BPF) backend cannot detect SCHED_FIFO tasks waiting on runqueue
queue_track_limitation_documentation.root_cause: task_running() check at stalld.bpf.c:273 only tracks __state == TASK_RUNNING, but runnable SCHED_FIFO tasks waiting on runqueue have different __state values
queue_track_limitation_documentation.evidence: Manual testing showed queue_track only detected pre-existing kworker tasks, completely missed SCHED_FIFO blockee tasks created by starvation_gen (blocker at priority 80, blockees at priority 1)
queue_track_limitation_documentation.impact: Tests using starvation_gen fail on queue_track but pass on sched_debug
queue_track_limitation_documentation.workaround: Use sched_debug backend for tests requiring SCHED_FIFO task detection

queue_track_limitation.description: BPF backend cannot detect SCHED_FIFO tasks waiting on runqueue
queue_track_limitation.root_cause: task_running() at stalld.bpf.c:273 only tracks __state == TASK_RUNNING
queue_track_limitation.problem: Runnable SCHED_FIFO tasks on runqueue have different __state values
queue_track_limitation.comparison: sched_debug backend reads kernel's .rt_nr_running counter directly, doesn't have this limitation
queue_track_limitation.workaround: Use sched_debug backend for tests requiring SCHED_FIFO task detection
